isis.stitle: TSI 01-12-03 - Water Pump Update For All International® I6 Engines

subjectgroup.subject: Water Pump Update For All International® I6 Engines

geninfo.para: Several updates have been made to the water pump to increase durability. These changes include:

item.para: The addition of a hole for grease cavity venting
Material changes for the bellows and mating ring seals
Improved face seal material and housing
Thicker hub on shaft of the water pump to help prevent front cover damage
Synthetic grease that is more coolant resistant used in the bearing

geninfo.para:
New water pump
[p/n 1830606C92 (extended life pump)] is implemented on all International DT 466E and International 530E applications starting with serial number 1267616 and above. This water pump displaces all other water pumps and can be used from engine serial number 850000 and above.
